TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AccessControlModification extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the type of access control modification to perform. This enumeration is used by methods of the class and its descendents.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlModification Add = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Add the specified authorization rule to the access control list (ACL).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlModification Remove = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Remove authorization rules that contain the same security identifier (SID) and access mask as the specified authorization rule from the ACL.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlModification RemoveAll = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Remove authorization rules that contain the same SID as the specified authorization rule from the ACL.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlModification RemoveSpecific = int32(5)

Docs.summary: Remove authorization rules that exactly match the specified authorization rule from the ACL.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlModification Reset = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Remove authorization rules that contain the same SID as the specified authorization rule from the ACL, and then add the specified authorization rule to the ACL.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlModification Set = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Remove all authorization rules from the ACL, then add the specified authorization rule to the ACL.
